title: League update slow as hell
body: So I'm updating league the speed is usually round "5000" kbps then when it hits 50 % it stays around "50-100" kbps. someone tell me why.

replies.body: It's like pulling teeth when there's an update now. I really wish they'd fix their shit already.

The patching process can take a while, depending on network factors and disk speeds. I recommend simply letting it run for a while alone and not stopping the process unless you run into an error.

Let me know if you run into further issues with patching.
